name: Thomas Aquinas
what_did:
Aquinas wrote big books that tried to explain faith using reason.
He asked deep questions like 'Does God exist?' and 'What is a good life?'
He used ideas from Aristotle to help understand religion better.
why_matters:
Aquinas helped bring together faith and reason.
His ideas became part of church teachings for hundreds of years.
He showed that thinking carefully is part of believing strongly.

questions.q: What did Aquinas use to explain religion?
